thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: DR

author: DR
title: DR
text: There are a number of search engines at one's fingertips however we ended up on Fliight Hub and booked our flights with ease. My only issue is we realized we booked an incorrect flight and immediately called to make the correction. Unfortunately, fees associated with making a change were several hundred dollars, thus we decided to retain our original booking. Service, however, was prompt, courteous and personal.
